action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: An older man is holding a blue water bottle in his right hand and a sandwich in his left hand. He is wearing a striped shirt and appears to be outdoors, possibly under a tent.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: The image shows two giraffes walking on a dirt path in a zoo. The background features a grassy hill with some trees and rocks. There is a chain-link fence in the foreground.

This is my DESCRIPTION: An older man is holding a blue water bottle in his right hand and a sandwich in his left hand. He is wearing a striped shirt and appears to be outdoors, possibly under a tent.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: What is the man holding in his right hand?

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image shows two giraffes walking on a dirt path in a zoo. The background features a grassy hill with some trees and rocks. There is a chain-link fence in the foreground.
QUESTION: What is the man holding in his right hand? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: What is the man wearing?

ANSWER: A blue water bottle.
QUESTION: What is the man wearing? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.

ANSWER: A striped shirt.
